content.rendered: Boag IP brings decades of legal experience to businesses, business owners, and entrepreneurs across the country and around the world. From its base in New York City Boag IP works with companies of all sizes, integrating its front line experience in the technology industry to streamline its practice.  Boag IP’s clients have access to big-firm knowledge, skills, and experience in a personalized boutique firm environment.
